DOC.brief_title: Efficacy SM Postural Instability Quality Life Patients With Chronic Non Specific Low Back Pain ( CNSLBP )
DOC.detailed_description: The protocol group A include High velocity low amplitude thrust ( HVLA ) lumbar region spine L1 L5 vertebrae.The HVLA thrust perform patient side lie neutral.52 They take part 12 treatment visit , 10 20 minute session SM 2 week . Light soft tissue technique ( i.e. , active passive muscle stretching , ischemic compression tender point ) may use need facilitate manual therapy . The protocol group B include set exercise therapy . There three component exercise therapy ( ET ) program : self education , supervise exercise visit , home exercise . The overall objective help patient 's manage LBP prevent future LBP recurrence . Total number visit 12 ( e.g. , ability perform exercise independently ) . Outcome : Patient self-report outcome collect first baseline visit base pain intensity quality life assess use numerical pain rating scale EuroQol questionnaire . Objective outcome measure collect first baseline visit base postural instability pressure pain threshold assess use Win track platform digital algometer .
DOC.criteria: 18 55 year age . Both gender . Subjects diagnose nonspecific chronic low back pain duration > 3 month . Low back pain intensityâ‰¥3 010 numerical pain rating scale . Injury surgery spine . Congenital spinal deformity ( e.g Spina bifida , Scoliosis , ankylose spondylitis etc ) Lumbar radiculopathy present neurological deficit . Subjects administer Epidural injection . Contraindication manipulationsvertebral malignancy , vertebralbasilar insufficiency , bone infection , fracture .
